about_the_game:
Defend against hordes of zombies in this immersive VR RPG. Strategize, fight, and survive in the ultimate zombie apocalypse experience!

INTRODUCTION:
Welcome to Tactical Rampart, the most intense and immersive zombie survival game! If you're a fan of action, strategy, and heart-pounding combat, this is the game for you.

In Tactical Rampart, you will face the relentless onslaught of the undead in a post-apocalyptic world. Your mission is to protect the rampart, use guns and strategically position towers to destroy zombies. This is not your ordinary zombie shooter; it's a tactical RPG that will test your wits and combat skills.

KEY FEATURE:

Tactical Brilliance: Plan your defenses, position towers, and use guns strategically to protect your rampart. Every decision matters.

Diverse Maps: Each map provides a fresh and distinct experience, requiring adaptation and creativity to safeguard your fortress.

Don't miss out on the ultimate zombie VR experience. Tactical Rampart is the game that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Add to wishlist now and see if you can defeat zombies and protect your rampart!

name: Tactical Rampart

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus or HTC Vive
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus or HTC Vive

short_description: Tactical Rampart is a RPG, survival game in which you will become the defender of a rampart from the attack of zombies in outer space. Using guns and towers, could you successfully defeat them?
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
